en: Praise ye Jehovah. Praise Jehovah, O my soul.
hmr: LALPA chu inpâk ro, Aw ka hringna, LALPA chu inpâk rawh.

en: While I live will I praise Jehovah: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.
hmr: Ka dam sûng po chun LALPA chu inpâk ka ta, Ka hring sûng po chun ka Pathien inpâkin hla sak ka tih.

en: Put not your trust in princes, Nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.
hmr: Mi lienhai chu ring naw unla, Mihriem naupa ṭhangpuina hrim hrim um nawna chu, ring bawk naw ro.

en: His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; In that very day his thoughts perish.
hmr: A thuokin a suok san a, ama chu leihnuoiah a kîr nâwk a, Chu ni ngei chun a ngaituona- hai chu a bo nghâl a nih.

en: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, Whose hope is in Jehovah his God:
hmr: Jakob Pathien ṭhangpuitua nei chu lâwmtakin a um hlak; LALPA Pathiena beiseina neitu chu.

en: Who made heaven and earth, The sea, and all that in them is; Who keepeth truth for ever;
hmr: Ama chu hnuoi dâm, vân dâm, Tuisuoriet dâm le an sûnga um po po siemtu a nih; Ama chun thutak kumkhuoa dingin a vawng ṭha hlak a nih.

en: Who executeth justice for the oppressed; Who giveth food to the hungry. Jehovah looseth the prisoners;
hmr: Ama chun nêksâwrna tuorhai ta dingin ro a rêl hlak, Ama chun phîngṭâmhai kuomah bu a pêk hlak. LALPA chun mi intânghai chu ân suoktir hlak.

en: Jehovah openeth the eyes of the blind; Jehovah raiseth up them that are bowed down; Jehovah loveth the righteous;
hmr: LALPA chun mitdelhai mit a sukvar hlak a, LALPA chun kûn ngâwi ngâwi hai chu a keitho hlak a; LALPA chun mi felhai chu a hmangai hlak.

en: Jehovah preserveth the sojourners; He upholdeth the fatherless and widow; But the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.
hmr: LALPA chun mikhuolhai chu a vawng ṭha hlak a, Pa neilo le hmeithai chu a chel zing hlak a; Mi rilohai lampui ruok chu a sukletling hlak.

en: Jehovah will reign for ever, Thy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye Jehovah.
hmr: LALPA chu kumkhawtluongin lalah ṭhung a ta, Aw Zion, i Pathien chu suon po po chenin lalah ṭhung a tih. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
